channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large Pothole, 5th January
item.description:
There is a large pothole on the inside lane of the northbound carriageway on the M5 between J10 and J9 - it's difficult for me to pinpoint where exactly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
